alert.note: Alert for Allen (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 8:00PM CDT until March 29 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Oakdale Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Oakdale. * WHEN...From Friday evening to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding, mainly forested areas along the river will occur. Park and picnic ground off of Highway 10 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday evening to a crest of 17.5 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Calcasieu River Oakdale 17.0 16.0 Wed 7 pm CDT 16.2 17.0 17.5 &&
